io.gearpump.streaming.executor

Class Executor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.executor.Executor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, TimeOutScheduler

    public class Executor
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Actor, TimeOutScheduler
    Executor is child of AppMaster. It usually represents a JVM process. It is a container for all tasks.
